title: Asian cucumber and chilli salad
ingredients: ['2 cucumbers - halved lengthwise, seeded, and sliced', '2 teaspoons salt', '120ml rice vinegar', '50g sugar', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '4 fresh red chilli peppers, sliced']
